## Events.get() function

Gets the class for a specific event type from the registry.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function get(eventType: string): new (...p1: any[]) => Abstract;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  eventType | string | The type of the event to get. |

**Returns:**

new (...p1: any\[\]) =&gt; [Abstract](./blockly.events.abstract.md)

The event class with the given type.
